verses.roman:
kṛṣṇera viyoge ei sevaka duḥkhita
kibā uttara dibe? ihāra nāhika samvit"

synonyms: kṛṣṇera viyoge—by separation from Kṛṣṇa; ei—these; sevaka—servants; duḥkhita—very unhappy; kibā—what; uttara—reply; dibe—will they give; ihāra—of these; nāhika—there's not; samvit—consciousness.
translation: " 'Separation from Kṛṣṇa has made these servants very unhappy. Having lost consciousness, how can they answer us?'
